pkgmetadata.longdescription:
[![](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/values.svg?maxAge=3600)](https://pypi.org/project/values/)[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Unlicense-blue.svg?longCache=True)](https://unlicense.org/)### Installation```bash$ [sudo] pip install values```#### Examples```python>>> import values>>> values.get(1)[1]>>> values.get("string")["string"]>>> values.get([1,2])[1,2]>>> values.get(None)[]```
